_sText:
A small arena project I made in a few days. There are 4 jump pads around the map, boosts on central circular ramp, auto-open jail system every 15 seconds, 32 spawn points and 1 small easter egg.

Any bugs, please PM me, any sugestions, please leave them below, and please assess. I would like to know your opinion and I'm open to any criticism.

Thank you and enjoy.

Note: I had an HDR version but even a tiny amount of bloom made the surfing annoying. If people are interested I can post it.
